General.Name: PPHE Hotel Group Ltd
General.Description: PPHE Hotel Group Limited owns, develops, leases, operates, and franchises full-service upscale and lifestyle hotels in the Netherlands, Germany, Hungary, Serbia, Italy, Austria, and the United Kingdom. It owns and operates hotels and resorts under the Park Plaza, the art'otel, Radisson Collection, and the Arena Campsites brands,  as well as the Arena Hotels & Apartments. The company was formerly known as Park Plaza Hotels Limited and changed its name to PPHE Hotel Group Limited in March 2012. PPHE Hotel Group Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
